content.html: I wanted a way to monitor trending CVEs on Twitter So I built CVEtrends.com - data comes from Twitter + NIST NVD APIs - back-end: Python, Flask, PostgreSQL, and Redis - front-end: React + Bootstrap It's a quick MVP, but let me know your thoughts and feedback...
content.value:
I wanted a way to monitor trending CVEs on Twitter

So I built CVEtrends.com 

- data comes from Twitter + NIST NVD APIs
- back-end: Python, Flask, PostgreSQL, and Redis
- front-end: React + Bootstrap

It's a quick MVP, but let me know your thoughts and feedback...
